data.title: Add a "no superweapons" tech level to RA.
data.body:
This addresses one of the biggest remaining complaints/requests that we see from casual players scattered over our various feedback channels.

The new "No Superweapons" options disables the three superweapon structures in the game: Missile Silo, Iron Curtain, Chronosphere.  It does _not_ remove any of the support powers (GPS, parabombs, etc), nor does it attempt to address the balance of the chrono tank (which is implicitly removed) or the demo truck (which isn't).

data.title: Added support for the Kate text editor
data.body:
See http://kate-editor.org/2012/11/02/using-the-projects-plugin-in-kate/ for reference. I should have set this up way earlier. It supports project wide search (and replace) which is now quite necessary after the rules have been split up into many different files and adds other convenient features such as build commands. Not sure if this is helpful for anyone else. I may be the only user, but on the other hand this JSON file is hidden, small and won't need any maintenance.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/12535624/838f5ff0-c289-11e5-8f0c-379fe4075c74.png)

data.title: Directional armor
data.body: Closes #9268

data.title: Moved Kennel in Soviet buildings tab as per issue 8973
data.body: Moves the Kennel to the end of the Soviet buildings tab to align all the other buildings so that hotkeys match across factions. Closes #8973.

data.title: Add support for playing a BridgeRepaired notification
Port Stargus from Stratagus engine to OpenRA engine is possible?
data.body:
"Disclaimer

Stargus is not an official Blizzard product, it's a Starcraft modification, by Starcraft fans for Starcraft fans. You need a copy of the original Starcraft version to make use of Stargus. Starcraft is a registered trademark of Blizzard Entertainment."

data.title: ReloadDelay does not appear to correctly apply to ObeliskLaserFire
data.body:
While working on  #10563 I noticed that the reason it didn't fire was because ReloadDelay was set to 120. Setting it to 1 allows it to fire but prevents animations from functioning correctly. Any Value less than 4 seems to have no effect on the Obelisk firing while any value greater than 4 prevents it from firing more than once.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/30142931-reloaddelay-does-not-appear-to-correctly-apply-to-obelisklaserfire?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Adjusted the Tiberian Sun harvester spawn point
data.body: so it becomes created at the docking position.

data.title: Opening replay from folder with a space crashes client.
data.body:
Opening a replay from a folder with a space in the path crashes the client.
My Downloads folder is location in a folder with a space (D:\Remy Baratte\Downloads).

```
Red Alert Mod at Version release-20151224
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.2.9200.0)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.42000
Exception of type `System.IO.FileNotFoundException`: Could not find file 'D:\Remy'.
   at System.IO.__Error.WinIOError(Int32 errorCode, String maybeFullPath)
   at System.IO.FileStream.Init(String path, FileMode mode, FileAccess access, Int32 rights, Boolean useRights, FileShare share, Int32 bufferSize, FileOptions options, SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES secAttrs, String msgPath, Boolean bFromProxy, Boolean useLongPath, Boolean checkHost)
   at System.IO.FileStream..ctor(String path, FileMode mode, FileAccess access, FileShare share, Int32 bufferSize, FileOptions options, String msgPath, Boolean bFromProxy)
   at System.IO.FileStream..ctor(String path, FileMode mode)
   at OpenRA.FileFormats.ReplayMetadata.Read(String path)
   at OpenRA.Mods.Common.LoadScreens.BlankLoadScreen.StartGame(Arguments args)
   at OpenRA.Game.InitializeMod(String mod, Arguments args)
   at OpenRA.Game.Initialize(Arguments args)
   at OpenRA.Program.Run(String[] args)
   at OpenRA.Program.Main(String[] args)
```

data.title: Added the water variant for the wooden crate
data.body: Also comes with a lint test now.

data.body: Also enables those warnings in ts and ra.

data.body: Just some small unhardcoding and documenting.

when they are not paradropped.

See https://github.com/OpenRA/ra2/pull/40 for reference.

data.body: which cause the linter to run amok if you actually use it.

data.title: d2k-infantry missing idle animation
data.body: except for the grenadier , theres no infantry with idle-animation in the release

data.title: Stuck AI harvesters can be a problem
data.body:
This happens in TS/RA2 where the AI stacks building too close together or builds a refinery which exits to a cliff as the bibs are solely decoration. Harvesters failing to path constantly is expensive.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/12529587/ce325cb0-c1bc-11e5-9a30-05043d5ddf80.png)
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/30137318-stuck-ai-harvesters-can-be-a-problem?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Added support for playing a "Our ally is under attack" notification
data.body: Also tried to improve performance by moving a few checks around.

data.title: Fixes Obelisk not attacking again after a forced attack command
data.body:
This PR should fix #10165,
Reload delay was set to 120 so the obelisk would wait that long before charging again. Another attack move would overwrite this request explaining the behavior

data.title: Implement ClassicFacingFudge for fudging classic facings.
data.body:
Fixes #4823.

This is a relatively invasive change, so please check carefully for regressions or any actors that I've missed fudges for.  Be sure to check both the editor and ingame.

data.title: Fix bogus conditional in soviet03 lua script
data.body: Fixes #10560.

data.title: EnterTransport stopped working for Soviet03 buildings
data.body: The enemy Spy used to enter the church buildings... now he just stands infront of them. Tested on the latest bleed.

data.title: Added the possibility to zoom the map
data.body:
Adds the possibility to zoom the map.

Because of my inactivity the previous PR was closed. This PR refs #9906
I fixed the remaining coding issues but didn't find a option to reopen the previous PR.
Hope that I'm not too late.

data.title: Unhardcode the chronoshift cursor sequences
data.body: Not only adds documentation, but also let's us perform some cleanup, like https://github.com/OpenRA/ra2/pull/74.

data.title: More cleanup in the production logic
data.body: Depends on #10532 (the first five commits in here).

data.title: Error messages during mod installation are not truncated to fit the dialog
data.body:
![screen shot 2016-01-16 at 11 40 53](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/167819/12372180/20cf2bfa-bc46-11e5-9305-9ec8a3c78802.png)

We may want to implement new options for truncating strings so that we can specify that the start of the path should be chopped off (which is at an arbitrary position inside the string).

data.title: Fix TD/RA/TS installation from CD.
data.body: Fixes #10529 to aid with testing #10530, #10535, #10554.

data.title: Remove IReadOnlyPackage.Priority
data.body: This removes the last of the legacy crap from the `IReadOnlyPackage` interface by replacing the hardcoded package priorities with mod-defined priority via the package order in mod.yaml.

data.title: MSAM Trajectory change.
data.body:
changes from 341 to 300.

This allows aircraft to escape the MSAM with the same mechanics as
current release. In https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/10552 the
reload speed was changed to prevent stand still. This allows them to
keep fire rates up rather then wasted fire.

The missile mechanic change is a great buff addition. Thank you very
much!

data.title: TD Balance Changes v1192016
data.body:
Balance changes are as followed:

Increase power of AGT to 50 from 40.

MSAM faster reload to 45 from 100.

Increase APC damage vs light target to 105 from 100.

MLRS attack speed increase to 100 from 140.

Rocket Infantry damage increase to 35 from 30.

MCV Price increase to 4000 from 2000. Build time increase from 0:48 to
1:36.

MCV unit HP increase to 950 from 750. armor type Heavy from Light.

MCV now requires both Command Center and Repair Pad to produce.

Construction yard HP increase to 2000 from 1400.

Repair pad HP increase to 600 from 400.

Link discussion at:
http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&p=294421#294421
